programme.desc: Alice returns to the magical world of Underland and takes a journey back in time to save her friends. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Mia Wasikowska and Johnny Depp(n)

programme.title: Santa's Little Helper
programme.desc: After getting the sack, a fast-talking businessman enters an elf competition to become Santa's next second-in-command. Comedy, starring Mike `The Miz' Mizanin, AnnaLynne McCord, Saraya-Jade Bevis(n)

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: The pig and his farmyard pals take a trip to the big city, where their curiosity and love of adventure lands them in trouble, leaving the courageous Babe to find a way to save his chums from danger. Family comedy sequel, starring Magda Szubanski, Mickey Rooney and James Cromwell, and featuring the voice of Elizabeth Daily as Babe(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Amnesiac rogue assassin Jason Bourne's long-buried memories are reawakened by a British journalist researching the secret organisation that was responsible for transforming him into a killing machine. Meanwhile, a ruthless CIA director becomes convinced Bourne is still a security risk, and plans to dispose of him once and for all. Third instalment of the spy thriller series, directed by Paul Greengrass and starring Matt Damon, Joan Allen, Julia Stiles, David Strathairn, Paddy Considine, Scott Glenn and Albert Finney

programme.title: My Father Die
programme.desc: A deaf mute waits almost two decades to get his hands on his abusive father. Action drama, starring Joe Anderson, John Schneider and Kevin Gage

programme.title: Loss of Faith
programme.desc: A crime writer is drawn into intrigue and danger while investigating the kidnapping of a baby boy and the murder of the child's wealthy father. Mystery thriller, starring John Ritter, Michele Scarabelli, Daphne Zuniga and Roddy McDowall

programme.title: 10 Cent Pistol
programme.desc: A pair of low-life criminal brothers target the powerful LA mobster who left one of them rotting in prison. Crime caper, starring Jena Malone and Joe Mantegna

programme.title: Anti-Social
programme.desc: Crime drama, following the criminal exploits of anarchic street artist Dee and his violent gang member and jewel thief brother Marcus, who live on a London council estate. Starring Gregg Sulkin and Josh Myers

programme.title: Level Up
programme.desc: A man is forced to deliver a mysterious package across London for criminals who are holding his girlfriend hostage. Action thriller, starring Josh Bowman, Neil Maskell and William Houston

programme.title: The Hatton Garden Job
programme.desc: A ragtag group of career criminals plot an audacious, multi-million-pound raid on an underground facility in London. True-life crime drama, with Stephen Moyer, Larry Lamb and Matthew Goode

programme.title: Enemy of the State
programme.desc: A chance encounter with an old friend derails a successful lawyer's fast-track career, plunging him headlong into a deadly game of cat and mouse with relentless government agents capable of anticipating his every move. He quickly realises the only way to save his own life is to expose the truths his pursuers seem so intent on covering up, and seeks out a former intelligence agent to take them on at their own game. Thriller, starring Will Smith, Gene Hackman, Jon Voight and Lisa Bonet

programme.title: The Hollow Point
programme.desc: A hard-drinking sheriff and his deputy are pitted against a sadistic cartel hitman. Crime thriller, starring Patrick Wilson, Ian McShane and John Leguizamo

programme.title: Body of Lies
programme.desc: CIA agent Roger Ferris hatches a bold but dangerous plan to capture terrorist Al-Saleem. With the help of Ed Hoffman who is a master of subterfuge, Ferris creates a fake terrorist organization to prompt Al-Saleem out of hiding. Spy thriller, starring Leonardo DiCaprio and Russell Crowe

programme.title: Black Rain
programme.desc: Two New York cops arrest a hitman working for the Japanese Mafia, and are ordered to extradite him back to Osaka to stand trial. However, the prisoner gives them the slip on arrival, and as the detectives hunt him down with the aid of local law enforcement officers they become snared in a vicious gang war. Ridley Scott's thriller, starring Michael Douglas, Andy Garcia, Ken Takakura and Yasaku Matsuda

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: The story of 1970s drug kingpin Frank Lucas, whose innovative methods of smuggling heroin into the US made him one of the leading figures in the New York underworld. A detective is assigned to bring Lucas's empire down, but his investigation is undermined by police corruption. Ridley Scott's fact-based crime drama, starring Denzel Washington, Russell Crowe, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Josh Brolin

programme.title: Hannibal
programme.desc: Fugitive serial killer Dr Hannibal Lecter has gone into hiding as an academic in Italy, but a disfigured victim is determined to find him and inflict a gruesome revenge. FBI agent Clarice Starling is once again drawn into the doctor's deadly orbit as she finds herself being used as bait for the avenger's trap. Ridley Scott's thriller sequel, starring Anthony Hopkins, Julianne Moore, Gary Oldman and Ray Liotta(n)

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: When accountant Jonathan Mardukas skips bail after having been arrested for embezzlement, bounty hunter Jack Walsh is hired to catch the fraudster and return him from New York to Los Angeles. Unfortunately, his task is hindered by the ingenuity of Mardukas and the attentions of pursuing FBI agents and Mafia hitmen. Comedy thriller, starring Robert De Niro, Charles Grodin, Yaphet Kotto, Dennis Farina, John Ashton and Joe Pantoliano(n)

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet(n)

programme.title: The Squeeze
programme.desc: A successful golfer falls under the spell of a charismatic gambler and conman, and together they embark on a campaign of scamming that takes them to Las Vegas. However, the golfer soon finds himself in over his head and will need the help of the friends he left behind to save himself. Comedy drama, starring Jeremy Sumpter and Christopher McDonald(n)

programme.title: The Joker
programme.desc: A young cop is kidnapped by a masked serial killer. To keep himself alive, the captive detective must rely on the wisdom imparted to him by his older colleagues during their regular poker night, hoping that one of their tall tales might provide the inspiration he needs to outwit the murderer. Thriller, starring Beau Mirchoff and Ron Perlman(n)

programme.title: Strangerland
programme.desc: A couple move to a remote town in the Australian Outback, but their new life takes a tragic turn when their teenage children disappear during a dust storm. As the townsfolk mount a search, tension and suspicion rise and public opinion quickly turns against the parents. Thriller, starring Nicole Kidman, Joseph Fiennes and Hugo Weaving(n)

programme.title: Pay the Ghost
programme.desc: A professor's son vanishes without trace during a Halloween carnival. One year later, the academic becomes determined to solve the mystery of the boy's disappearance, but his search for answers leads him to encounter dangerous paranormal forces. Supernatural thriller based on a short story by Tim Lebbon, starring Nicolas Cage and Sarah Wayne Callies(n)

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: A tight-knit FBI team is torn apart when the daughter of one of the agents is raped and murdered, and the case goes unsolved. Years later, a member of the team uncovers a new clue that he hopes will allow him to bring the killer to justice. However, the victim's grieving mother is dissatisfied with the law and takes matters into her own hands. Crime drama, starring Julia Roberts, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Nicole Kidman(n)

programme.title: Manhattan Night
programme.desc: Porter Wren, a columnist and crime reporter for a New York City newspaper, is convinced by the alluring Caroline Crowley to investigate her film director husband's death. Thriller, starring Adrien Brody, Yvonne Strahovski and Jennifer Beals(n)

programme.title: Inside Man
programme.desc: A police hostage negotiator is called in when a robbery turns into a siege. The chairman of the bank involved is worried the mastermind behind the heist is set to disclose secrets he needs to stay hidden, so he enlists the help of a political fixer. However, the elaborate nature of the thief's plan looks set to keep him one step ahead of the law, and causes problems for the detective assigned to rectify the situation. Spike Lee's thriller, with Denzel Washington, Clive Owen, Jodie Foster, Christopher Plummer, Willem Dafoe and Chiwetel Ejiofor(n)

programme.title: Money Train
programme.desc: A New York cop in debt to loan sharks persuades his foster brother and fellow police officer to rob a train carrying all the day's takings from the city's subway network. However, things start to go wrong when a female detective creates rivalry between the pair, and a pyromaniac serial killer threatens their plans. Action comedy, starring Woody Harrelson, Wesley Snipes, Jennifer Lopez and Chris Cooper(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: The bookish Anastasia Steele and damaged billionaire playboy Christian Grey continue their sado masochistic relationship, while their safety is threatened by strangers from his past. Erotic drama sequel to Fifty Shades of Grey, starring Dakota Johnson, Jamie Dornan and Rita Ora(n)

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: A smart-mouthed PR executive answers a public phone and the caller on the other end warns him that if he hangs up he will be shot. The unseen gunman then puts his target through a tortuous series of mind games, as well as incriminating him in the death of a bystander. Psychological thriller, starring Colin Farrell, Kiefer Sutherland, Katie Holmes and Forest Whitaker(n)

programme.title: Undercover Hooligan
programme.desc: Suspended cop Michael Clarke is tasked with infiltrating an infamous London gang and bringing down its leader. British crime drama, starring Kris Johnson and Patrick Connolly(n)

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner(n)

programme.title: Wild Horses
programme.desc: A detective reopens a fifteen-year-old missing persons investigation and the clues lead her to suspect that the missing boy was murdered and his death is linked to a local rancher. Drama, starring Luciana Duvall, Robert Duvall and James Franco(n)

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman survives a car crash, and wakes up to find herself in an underground bunker, belonging to a survivalist who claims that a devastating attack has left the outside world uninhabitable. As he behaviour becomes increasingly stranger, she begins to fear she is being tricked and resolves to discover the truth for herself. Thriller, starring Mary Elizabeth Winstead and John Goodman(n)

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: An inexperienced financial trader is taken under the wing of a corrupt New York corporate raider, who draws him into the shady world of illegal insider dealing with promises of money and power. But the trainee stockbroker questions the morality of his actions when the consequences of a deal strike close to home. Oliver Stone's Oscar-winning drama, starring Michael Douglas, father and son Martin and Charlie Sheen, Daryl Hannah and Terence Stamp(n)

programme.title: Wall Street: Money Never Sleeps
programme.desc: Ruthless stockbroker Gordon Gekko is released from prison after eight years, reinventing himself as an author and lecturer warning against the dangers of the financial system. Gekko helps a young banker get revenge on the company that drove his mentor to suicide, but as always, has a crooked agenda of his own. Oliver Stone's sequel to his 1980s drama, with Michael Douglas, Shia LaBeouf and Carey Mulligan(n)

programme.title: Kill Me Three Times
programme.desc: A hitman arrives in an Australian surfing town on a mission. However, he soon discovers he is not the only one plotting to kill his intended target, and gets mixed up in his rivals' stories of murder, blackmail and revenge. Comedy thriller, starring Simon Pegg, Alice Braga, Luke Hemsworth and Bryan Brown(n)

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Narcotics detectives Crockett and Tubbs go undercover and pose as smugglers to infiltrate a powerful drug cartel. However, the operation is threatened when Crockett becomes dangerously involved with the wife of the organisation's ringleader. Michael Mann's crime thriller based on the 1980s TV series, starring Colin Farrell, Jamie Foxx, Gong Li, Naomie Harris and Luis Tosar(n)

programme.title: SWAT
programme.desc: A cop's career is seemingly over when he accidentally shoots a hostage while thwarting a bank robbery. He is given the chance to redeem himself by joining an elite unit headed by a veteran sergeant. Their mission is to escort an international crime lord in custody as he is taken to prison. However, they hit a snag when their prisoner offers a multimillion-dollar reward to anyone who breaks him out of jail, placing them under attack from every criminal in the city. Action thriller, starring Samuel L Jackson and Colin Farrell(n)

programme.title: The Colony
programme.desc: A man travelling through Chile in the 1970s is abducted by the secret police during the military coup that brought Pinochet to power. His girlfriend tries to find out what has happened to him, but to uncover the truth, she must join a cult posing as a charitable organisation, from which no one has ever escaped. Drama, starring Emma Watson and Daniel Bruhl(n)

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: An inexperienced financial trader is taken under the wing of a corrupt New York corporate raider, who draws him into the shady world of illegal insider dealing with promises of money and power. But the trainee stockbroker questions the morality of his actions when the consequences of a deal strike close to home. Oliver Stone's Oscar-winning drama, starring Michael Douglas, father and son Martin and Charlie Sheen, Daryl Hannah and Terence Stamp(n)

programme.title: Miller's Crossing
programme.desc: A Mob boss watches as his empire crumbles around him after he refuses to have his girlfriend's brother killed. A disgruntled henchman responds by heading up a breakaway criminal faction, while the boss's right-hand man tries to decide where his loyalties lie. The Coen brothers' Prohibition-era gangster thriller, starring Gabriel Byrne, Albert Finney, Marcia Gay Harden and John Turturro

A bureaucrat in a totalitarian society whose populace are kept under constant surveillance begins to question the regime he works for, and begins a secret, illegal relationship with a fellow subversive. However, their small rebellion is doomed to end in tragedy. Futuristic drama based on George Orwell's novel, starring John Hurt Richard Burton and Suzanna Hamilton

programme.title: Cub
programme.desc: A young boy goes on a camping trip with his fellow Cub Scouts, and crosses paths with a bloodthirsty poacher. Belgian horror, starring Maurice Luijten, Evelien Bosmans and Titus De Voogdt. In Flemish, French and Dutch

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Forthcoming films

programme.title: Lolo
programme.desc: A Paris fashionista's scheming teenage son threatens to derail her love life. Dark comedy, directed by and starring Julie Delpy, with Dany Boon and Vincent Lacoste

programme.title: Ordinary People
programme.desc: A wealthy American family faces upheaval and heartbreak following the tragic death of the eldest son in a boating accident. His brother finds it particularly hard to cope, convincing himself that he should have died instead, and finds little solace in his parents. Robert Redford's directorial debut won four Oscars including Best Film, and stars Donald Sutherland, Mary Tyler Moore and Timothy Hutton

programme.title: Man Down
programme.desc: Former US Marine Gabriel Drummer returns home from Afghanistan and searches for the whereabouts of his son, accompanied by his best friend. Drama, starring Shia LaBeouf, Jai Courtney and Kate Mara

programme.title: The New World
programme.desc: A 17th-century English settler in America falls in love with a native princess, but as conflict erupts between their people he is forced to abandon her. She is converted to Christianity, adopting European culture and forming a romance with a tobacco planter, but remains torn between two worlds. Terrence Malick's epic historical drama, starring Colin Farrell, Q'orianka Kilcher, Christian Bale and Christopher Plummer

programme.title: The Thin Red Line
programme.desc: The personal stories of American soldiers sent to fight on the Pacific island of Guadalcanal during the Second World War. The men, among them a former deserter, are forced to confront their fears and beliefs during a bitter conflict for control of a key airfield. Terrence Malick's Second World War drama, adapted from James Jones' 1962 novel. Starring Sean Penn, Ben Chaplin, Nick Nolte, Jim Caviezel and Woody Harrelson

programme.title: Stone of Destiny
programme.desc: Four students in 1950s Glasgow hatch a plan to inspire a little national pride by breaking into Westminster Abbey and stealing the Stone of Scone, an important Scottish historical relic that has been held on English soil since the Middle Ages, and returning it to its own country. Fact-based comedy, starring Charlie Cox, Kate Mara, Billy Boyd and Robert Carlyle

programme.title: Braveheart
programme.desc: Account of the life of medieval Scottish hero William Wallace. After the slaughter of his father and brother, young Wallace is taken in by his uncle, who teaches him how to use not only his brawn but his brain - which he employs to great effect years later when he resolves to drive the English out of Scotland. Oscar-winning historical epic, directed by and starring Mel Gibson. With Patrick McGoohan, Sophie Marceau and Catherine McCormack

programme.title: T2: Trainspotting
programme.desc: After 20 years abroad, Mark Renton returns to Scotland and reunites with his old friends Sick Boy, Spud, and Begbie. Danny Boyle's sequel to the 1996 drama, starring Ewan McGregor, Ewen Bremner and Jonny Lee Miller

programme.title: Iona
programme.desc: A woman fleeing the aftermath of a violent crime seeks refuge on the Scottish island where she grew up, bringing her teenage son with her. Her return has serious ramifications for the friends she left behind, while the boy grows to understand a simpler way of life than he is used to and discovers why his mother rebelled against it. Drama, starring Ruth Negga and Douglas Henshall(n)

programme.title: Boys Don't Cry
programme.desc: A transgender man arrives in a small town and soon proves to be a big hit with its residents, even winning the heart of a local woman. When his new friends discover he is anatomically female, they quickly turn against him, and plot a horrific act of violence. Fact-based drama, starring an Oscar-winning Hilary Swank alongside Chloe Sevigny and Peter Sarsgaard(n)

programme.title: Colt 45
programme.desc: Vincent, a young police firearms expert, is forced to make use of his skills as a marksman when he is ambushed by an unknown assailant. Left with a killing to cover up, Vincent turns to a fellow gun enthusiast with ties to the criminal underworld offers to help him dispose of the evidence. In exchange, he hands over a small arsenal of weapons - including a set of home-made, explosive .45 ammo, but when said guns are used in a string of deadly robberies, Vincent must turn to seasoned police commander Chavez to help correct his fatal error of judgement. French action thriller, starring Ymanol Perset, Joey Starr and Gerard Lanvin(n)

programme.title: Strangers on a Train
programme.desc: A charming psychopath meets a tennis professional on a train and suggests that they each commit a murder on the other's behalf. However, when the deranged man goes through with his part of the deal, the sportsman faces a race against time to prove his innocence. Alfred Hitchcock's thriller, based on the novel by Patricia Highsmith, starring Robert Walker, Farley Granger and Ruth Roman(n)

programme.title: The Lesson
programme.desc: In a small Bulgarian town, a young teacher is looking for the robber in her class so she can teach him a lesson about right and wrong. However, when she gets in debt to loan sharks, she faces her own problems. Drama, starring Margita Gosheva, Ivan Barnev and Ivan Savov(n)

programme.title: Bluebird
programme.desc: During a freezing cold winter in the frozen woods of an isolated Maine logging town, a lapse of concentration has devastating consequences for a school bus driver. Drama, starring Amy Morton, John Slattery and Louisa Krause(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: The story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, and his friendship with his mentor at Trinity College, Cambridge, Professor GH Hardy. Biographical drama, starring Jeremy Irons, Dev Patel and Malcolm Sinclair(n)

programme.title: Cemetery of Splendour
programme.desc: A group of soldiers in a small town on the Mekong River in northern Thailand are struck with a bizarre sleeping illness. Fantasy drama, starring Jenjira Pongpas, Banlop Lomnoi and Jarinpattra Rueangram. In Thai(n)

programme.title: Maggie's Plan
programme.desc: A young New Yorker's plan to have a kid on her own is derailed when she falls for a married man. Romantic comedy, starring Greta Gerwig, Ethan Hawke and Bill Hader(n)

programme.title: The Beguiled
programme.desc: A wounded Union soldier is given refuge in a girls' boarding school in the Confederate south during the American Civil War. However, his presence provokes jealousy and deceit among the students and teachers, and in an atmosphere of emotional and sexual repression they succumb to his overt masculinity and art of seduction. Drama, starring Clint Eastwood, Geraldine Page, Elizabeth Hartman and Jo Ann Harris(n)

programme.title: Hustle & Flow
programme.desc: A pimp and drug pusher decides to change his ways after reaching the age at which his father died. Using his experience of life on the streets, he becomes a rapper, and an encounter with a local hip-hop star gives him the perfect chance to begin his career in music. Drama, starring Terrence Howard, Anthony Anderson, Taryn Manning and Isaac Hayes(n)

programme.title: 8 Mile
programme.desc: A white rapper strives to make a name for himself on the music scene, but his deprived home life on a Detroit trailer park and romantic complications put a damper on his plans as he struggles to win over the crowds and earn the respect of his peers. Drama, starring Eminem, Kim Basinger, Mekhi Phifer and Brittany Murphy(n)

programme.title: Out of Sight
programme.desc: A charming bank robber breaks out of jail and takes a female US Marshal hostage. Managing to escape, she sets out to track him down as he prepares for one last job - but as the chase intensifies, so do their feelings for each other. Steven Soderbergh's romantic crime drama, based on Elmore Leonard's novel, with George Clooney, Jennifer Lopez, Ving Rhames and Don Cheadle(n)

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: American officer Aldo Raine leads a squad of soldiers into occupied France on a mission to kill as many Nazis as possible and spread fear through the Third Reich. They become involved in a Jewish resistance fighter's plan to blow up the premiere of a propaganda movie - due to be attended by Hitler himself. Quentin Tarantino's wartime adventure, with Brad Pitt, Melanie Laurent, Diane Kruger, Michael Fassbender and an Oscar-winning Christoph Waltz(n)

programme.title: Straight Time
programme.desc: A jailbird resolves to turn over a new leaf, but is eventually dragged back into a life of crime by his former underworld associates. Drama, starring Dustin Hoffman, Harry Dean Stanton, Theresa Russell, Gary Busey and Kathy Bates(n)

programme.title: The Ox-Bow Incident
programme.desc: Cowboys intervene in a bid to prevent the lynching of three men accused of murdering a rancher and stealing his cattle. Western drama, starring Henry Fonda, Henry Morgan and Anthony Quinn(n)

programme.title: I Saw the Light
programme.desc: Biopic of influential country singer Hank Williams, exploring his tempestuous marriage and addiction to alcohol and painkillers. With Tom Hiddleston and Elizabeth Olsen(n)

programme.title: The White Ribbon
programme.desc: A village in Germany is plagued by strange events in the months leading up to the First World War, as a series of accidents leads on to mysterious acts of vandalism and people being attacked by unknown assailants. As the villagers try to cope with their bad fortune, secrets start to come to light. Michael Haneke's Palme d'Or-winning mystery, starring Christian Friedel and Leonie Benesch. In German, Italian and Polish(n)

programme.title: Girl Asleep
programme.desc: In the 1970s, a shy teen is flung into a parallel world when her parents throw her a surprise birthday party. Coming-of-age fantasy drama, starring Bethany Whitmore, Harrison Feldman and Amber McMahon(n)

programme.title: The Truman Show
programme.desc: A man is unaware his uneventful life is really a sham, and his every move is being secretly filmed and broadcast to the world as part of a 24-hour TV soap. However, a series of unforeseen events leads him to question the nature of his existence. Peter Weir's media satire, starring Jim Carrey, Natascha McElhone, Laura Linney, Noah Emmerich and Ed Harris(n)

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: Biopic of the brilliant American mathematician John Nash, whose prospects of a promising career with the CIA were confounded by paranoid delusions and schizophrenia as the stress of the job proved too much of a burden. Oscar-winning drama, starring Russell Crowe, Jennifer Connelly, Ed Harris, Judd Hirsch, Paul Bettany and Christopher Plummer(n)

programme.title: Concussion
programme.desc: A doctor discovers a dead American football player died as the result of brain trauma inflicted on the field. He tries to raise awareness of the danger and provide greater protection from injury for players, but finds himself up against a powerful institution determined to bury the risk. Fact-based drama, starring Will Smith, Alec Baldwin and Albert Brooks(n)

programme.title: William Shakespeare's Romeo + Juliet
programme.desc: A city is divided by the conflict between two feuding families - the fathers are bitter business rivals, and the younger generation are continually fighting in the streets. The son of one household falls in love at first sight with his enemy's daughter - but the vendetta threatens their secret romance. Baz Luhrmann's modern update of Shakespeare's tragic love story, with Leonardo DiCaprio, Claire Danes, Pete Postlethwaite and Miriam Margolyes(n)

programme.title: The Revenant
programme.desc: A frontiersman leading a hunting party through the wilderness is mauled by a bear, and a travelling companion who pledged to stay with him until help comes kills his son and leaves him for dead. Against all odds, the wounded man survives his injuries and embarks on a gruelling quest for revenge that takes him through a harsh landscape. Western, starring an Oscar-winning Leonardo DiCaprio, with Tom Hardy and Domhnall Gleeson(n)

programme.title: Dazed and Confused
programme.desc: The students of a Texas high-school enjoy the last day of term in 1976, spending their time in pursuit of sex, drink or drugs. Meanwhile, the newly arrived freshmen are put through a series of humiliating initiation pranks. Richard Linklater's comedy drama, starring Ben Affleck, Milla Jovovich, Matthew McConaughey and Parker Posey(n)

programme.title: Wall Street: Money Never Sleeps
programme.desc: Ruthless stockbroker Gordon Gekko is released from prison after eight years, reinventing himself as an author and lecturer warning against the dangers of the financial system. Gekko helps a young banker get revenge on the company that drove his mentor to suicide, but as always, has a crooked agenda of his own. Oliver Stone's sequel to his 1980s drama, with Michael Douglas, Shia LaBeouf and Carey Mulligan

programme.title: Midnight Lace
programme.desc: American heiress Kit Preston is living a life of luxury in London with her new husband, but her idyllic life is shattered when she is terrorised by strange phone calls and voices in the fog. Her husband dismisses the threats as a practical joke, but as the scary incidents and menacing calls mount it becomes clear that someone really does have it in for her. Thriller, starring Doris Day, Rex Harrison, Roddy McDowall, Hermione Baddeley and Myrna Loy

programme.title: 20 Million Miles to Earth
programme.desc: An American space mission to Venus brings back a bizarre reptilian creature from the planet's surface, but once exposed to Earth's atmosphere it suddenly begins to grow at an alarming rate and wreaks havoc on the streets of Rome. Sci-fi thriller, starring William Hopper, Joan Taylor and Frank Puglia, with special effects by Ray Harryhausen(c)

programme.title: Self-Portrait
programme.desc: Stars including Tom Hanks, Judi Dench, Leonardo DiCaprio and Olivia Colman talk candidly about the art of screen acting(c)

programme.title: Man Without a Star
programme.desc: A wandering cowboy and his naive travelling partner are hired by an ambitious ranch owner, who wishes to expand her territory at the cost of her struggling neighbours. The drifter sympathises with the plight of the other farmers, but disapproves of the methods they intend to use to mark their territory. King Vidor's Western, starring Kirk Douglas, Jeanne Crain, William Campbell, Richard Boone and Claire Trevor

programme.title: Bear Island
programme.desc: UN scientists gather on a remote island in the Arctic, where they find a Nazi hoard of gold bullion in the wreck of a U-boat. However, the discovery brings a series of unexplained accidents and mysterious deaths in its wake. Thriller based on Alistair MacLean's novel, starring Donald Sutherland, Vanessa Redgrave, Richard Widmark and Christopher Lee

programme.title: Airplane II: The Sequel
programme.desc: Hapless hero Ted Striker tries to prevent the launch of a passenger space shuttle, certain it will end in disaster. Sadly, his prediction comes true when a computer malfunction sends the spacecraft hurtling toward the sun, while a man driven mad by sexual inadequacy smuggles a bomb on board. Disaster movie spoof sequel, starring Robert Hays, Julie Hagerty, Lloyd Bridges, William Shatner, Sonny Bono and Chad Everett

programme.title: Identity Thief
programme.desc: A con-woman acquires an executive's credit card numbers, and lives a life of luxury at his expense. The outraged victim sets out on a mission to track down the fraudster and bring her to justice personally - resulting in them travelling on a disastrous road trip across America together. Comedy, with Jason Bateman, Melissa McCarthy, Jon Favreau and Amanda Peet

programme.title: Everly
programme.desc: A woman forced into prostitution by a criminal overlord begins working with the police in an attempt to bring him down. He decides to silence her forever, leading to a bloody confrontation between her and his henchmen which she must win to stand any chance of saving her life, as well as her daughter and mother. Action thriller, starring Salma Hayek, Akie Kotabe and Laura Cepeda

programme.title: Her
programme.desc: A lonely man in the midst of a divorce downloads an artificial intelligence to act as an operating system for his computer. He finds himself better able to connect to the voice of the system than he can to any human being, and begins to fall in love with it. Sci-fi drama, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Amy Adams and Rooney Mara, with the voice of Scarlett Johansson(n)

programme.title: Earth vs the Flying Saucers
programme.desc: Aliens arrive on Earth with an ultimatum - surrender or face death - prompting humanity to pull out all the stops to find a way of defeating the extraterrestrial menace. Sci-fi drama, starring Hugh Marlowe, Joan Taylor, Donald Curtis and Morris Ankrum, with special effects by Ray Harryhausen(n)

programme.title: The Victors
programme.desc: A series of interlocking tales charting the advance of a US infantry across Europe. Initially based in Sicily, the soldiers are soon sent into battle in occupied France, moving into Germany as the Second World War comes to an end. Along the way, a member of the unit is tempted to desert by a woman who wants him to join her in the black market. Drama, starring George Peppard, Albert Finney, George Hamilton, Jeanne Moreau and Eli Wallach(n)

programme.title: Self-Portrait
programme.desc: Stars including Tom Hanks, Judi Dench, Leonardo DiCaprio and Olivia Colman talk candidly about the art of screen acting(n)

programme.title: Anzio
programme.desc: An American war correspondent joins Allied troops in 1944 as they prepare for their landing in Italy. A strategic blunder by their commanding officer gives German forces time to reinforce the area, leaving the reporter caught up in one of the campaign's fiercest battles. Second World War drama, starring Robert Mitchum, Peter Falk, Arthur Kennedy, Robert Ryan and Earl Holliman(n)

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: An American youngster goes to live in China with his mother, where he becomes an outsider and falls foul of the local bullies. He receives help from the kindly school caretaker, who turns out to be a kung fu master and offers to train the boy to defend himself. Martial arts drama, with Jaden Smith and Jackie Chan(n)

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: An uptight, ambitious FBI agent is sent to Boston to bring a notorious drug kingpin to justice. She ends up forced to team up with a rebellious, foul-mouthed local police detective who has a very different attitude to law enforcement but shares her inability to work with others. Action comedy, starring Sandra Bullock and Melissa McCarthy(n)

programme.title: Haywire
programme.desc: A mercenary is employed by the US government to carry out secret assignments, but on her latest mission, she is set up by one of the operatives who hired her. She fights her way through the world of international espionage in search of revenge, fending off assassins as she tries to find out who betrayed her. Action thriller, starring Gina Carano, Ewan McGregor, Michael Fassbender and Antonio Banderas(n)

programme.title: Electric Boogaloo: The Wild, Untold Story of Cannon Films
programme.desc: Documentary charting the history of the independent film company run by Israeli cousins Menahem Golan and Yoram Globus that specialised in low-budget movies during the 1980s, ranging from Chuck Norris and Charles Bronson action hits to arthouse fare by Jean-Luc Godard and John Cassavetes arthouse fare. Featuring contributions by Bo Derek, Elliott Gould, Dolph Lundgren and Franco Zeffirelli(n)

programme.title: The Three Stooges
programme.desc: Three babies left abandoned on an orphanage doorstep grow up into a bungling, accident prone trio of maintenance men. When the children's home is threatened with closure, they try to raise the money to save it, getting drawn into a murder plot and becoming the stars of a reality TV show. Slapstick comedy, with Sean Hayes, Will Sasso and Chris Diamantopoulos(n)

programme.title: The Muppet Christmas Carol
programme.desc: An embittered Victorian miser hates the festive season and people in general, but on Christmas Eve, the ghosts of his former business partners, the Marley brothers, visit him in the night. They warn him three spirits are coming to make him change his ways by showing him visions of the past, the present and what the future may hold. Comedy, with Michael Caine and Steven Mackintosh alongside the puppet characters(n)

programme.title: Letters to Juliet
programme.desc: A writer on holiday in Italy discovers a 50-year-old letter from a woman describing her regret at rejecting a man she was in love with. She is moved to reply, prompting the writer to turn up in person with her grandson in tow, and together they set out in search of her lost love to put things right. Romantic drama, starring Amanda Seyfried, Vanessa Redgrave and Gael Garcia Bernal(n)

programme.title: Miracle on 34th Street
programme.desc: When a popular New York department store Santa Claus is placed in an asylum for claiming to be the genuine article, a crusading city lawyer takes on the case, determined to prove the man's sanity. Christmas drama, starring Edmund Gwenn, Maureen O'Hara, Natalie Wood, John Payne, Gene Lockhart, Porter Hall and William Frawley(n)

programme.title: The Tourist
programme.desc: A fugitive's girlfriend is being watched by the police while travelling from Paris to Venice. She seduces an unsuspecting American tourist to make them think he is her lover with his appearance altered by plastic surgery, leaving the baffled holidaymaker pursued across Europe by the cops and rival gangsters. Romantic thriller, with Johnny Depp, Angelina Jolie and Paul Bettany(n)

programme.title: Solace
programme.desc: Premiere. A psychic is recruited by the FBI to help them track down an elusive serial killer before he can strike again. The case takes a psychologically dangerous turn when he realises that the murderer he is searching for has mental powers of his own. Crime thriller, starring Anthony Hopkins, Colin Farrell and Jeffrey Dean Morgan(n)

programme.title: The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones
programme.desc: A teenager discovers she is descended from a race of half-human, half-angel warriors whose duty is to defend the world from demons. When her mother disappears, she joins a group of the magical beings on a dangerous journey into an alternate version of New York inhabited by strange creatures. Fantasy adventure, starring Lily Collins, Jamie Campbell Bower, Lena Headey and Jonathan Rhys Meyers(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A jealous John-Boy runs into possible competition for the attention of his favourite schoolteacher

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Mary Ellen falls for a college student, while Grandma starts to feel the effects of old age as she reaches her 68th birthday

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The Ingalls family rallies round and tries to lift Grandfather Holbrook's spirits after the death of his wife by suggesting he write a book. Drama, starring Michael Landon and Barry Sullivan

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Telephones are installed in Walnut Grove, giving Mrs Oleson the opportunity to do a spot of eavesdropping - but unfortunately she overhears a secret which could destroy Jonathan and Alice Garvey's marriage

programme.title: The Christmas Box
programme.desc: A hard-working man's obsession with his business causes him to neglect his family - but a series of strange dreams makes him realise it is the most important thing in his life. Drama, starring Richard Thomas and Maureen O'Hara

programme.title: A Christmas Carol: The Musical
programme.desc: A mean-spirited miser is determined to ensure no one enjoys the festive season - until a Christmas Eve visit by a series of ghosts reveals his past, present and the future, with the intention of showing him the error of his cruel ways. Musical based on the Dickens story, starring Kelsey Grammer, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Jason Alexander, Jane Krakowski and Jesse L Martin

programme.title: A Carol Christmas
programme.desc: A self-interested TV talk-show host with heaps of money and a bad attitude vows to pull out all the stops to ensure she avoids any hint of seasonal goodwill, a plan that falls to pieces when three ghosts pay her an unscheduled visit to teach her a lesson. Festive comedy drama based on Dickens' classic story A Christmas Carol, with Tori Spelling, Dinah Manoff, Michael Landes, Jason Brooks and William Shatner

programme.title: A Dad for Christmas
programme.desc: A 19-year-old father visits his newborn son in hospital for the first time, only to find the boy's mother has already put him up for adoption. In desperation, he kidnaps the baby and hides out at his grandmother's house. Drama, starring Kristopher Turner, Louise Fletcher, Lindsay Ames and Dino Bellisario

programme.title: Prancer Returns
programme.desc: A youngster moves to a new area, but has trouble settling in, especially when the local bullies set their sights on him. However, his luck seems to take a turn for the better when he discovers a sweet little reindeer in the snow and vows to take care of it - only to have a battle on his hands when locals find out about the cute creature. Festive fantasy adventure, starring Gavin Fink, Stacy Edwards, John Corbett and Jack Palance

programme.title: The Christmas Box
programme.desc: A hard-working man's obsession with his business causes him to neglect his family - but a series of strange dreams makes him realise it is the most important thing in his life. Drama, starring Richard Thomas and Maureen O'Hara

programme.title: A Recipe for a Perfect Christmas
programme.desc: A would-be restaurant critic must complete her first article by Christmas Eve to guarantee her future career, but a visit from her overbearing mother leaves her with little time to work. The writer persuades a restaurateur to date her mother in return for a glowing review, only to see the fake romance unexpectedly turn into a real one. Comedy, starring Christine Baranski, Carly Pope and Bobby Cannavale

programme.title: The Year Without a Santa Claus
programme.desc: Father Christmas becomes so frustrated with the commercialisation of the festive season that he decides to quit - so two elves and a reindeer embark on a quest to find a child who still believes in the spirit of Christmas to persuade him to change his mind. Fantasy, starring John Goodman, Delta Burke and Michael McKean

programme.title: A Town Without Christmas
programme.desc: A sensitive youngster writes a letter to Santa Claus asking to be taken away from his battling parents so they can rebuild their crumbling relationship - prompting a reporter and a novelist to team up and track down the troubled child. Drama, starring Peter Falk, Patricia Heaton and Isabella Fink

programme.title: November Christmas
programme.desc: A father whose daughter is seriously ill fears she will not live through the year. He is determined to make sure her remaining time is happy, and with the help of his neighbours, he arranges to celebrate Halloween and Christmas months ahead of schedule so she can enjoy both holidays. Drama, starring John Corbett and Sam Elliott

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia embarks on a one-woman strike, prompting John to take her on a belated honeymoon after 19 years of marriage(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Charlie Harmon throws John a financial lifeline by offering him £5,000 for Walton's Mountain, but the deal comes with strings attached. Noah Beery guest stars(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The Davenports' grandson comes to stay and turns out to be an angry, hate-filled bully bent on causing trouble(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Albert and Laura try to scare a bully into behaving by convincing him there's a werewolf on the loose. Their plan fails miserably, but prompts the rest of the schoolchildren to make a stand against the playground tyrant(n)

programme.title: Secret Santa
programme.desc: A 10-year-old orphan is sent to live with his aunt after the deaths of his parents, and befriends an old man. He starts to believe his new friend is really Santa Claus, but his new guardian worries that the seemingly kindly stranger is a conman taking advantage of the youngster's faith. Family drama, starring Sherilyn Fenn, Hume Cronyn and Rory Culkin(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Reunion
programme.desc: An orphan yearns to be closer to his ageing grandfather, and his wish is granted after a visit to Santa Claus reveals a few home truths. Drama, with Edward Woodward, James Coburn and Meredith Edwards(n)

programme.title: Ms Scrooge
programme.desc: A mean-spirited banker is persuaded to change her ways when she is visited by a series of ghosts on Christmas eve. Festive fantasy inspired by Charles Dickens' A Christmas Carol, with Cicely Tyson and Katherine Helmond(n)

programme.title: Santa Baby
programme.desc: Santa Claus' rebellious daughter leaves the North Pole to become a successful businesswoman. Festive comedy, with Jenny McCarthy and George Wendt(n)

programme.title: Deck the Halls
programme.desc: A woman whose husband has died dreads spending her first Christmas without him. She finds herself with an eccentric new neighbour whom she takes an instant dislike to, but whom her son thinks is Santa Claus. The boy decides this man is just what his mother needs, so tries to play cupid. Festive drama, starring Gabrielle Carteris, Steve Bacic and Jocelyne Loewen(n)

programme.title: A Gift Wrapped Christmas
programme.desc: A personal shopper tries to make her new client get into the holiday spirit and spend more time with his young son. Comedy drama, starring Meredith Hagner, Travis Milne and Anna Van Hooft(n)

programme.title: Christmas Caper
programme.desc: A thief heads back to her hometown in Connecticut to lay low after a con goes wrong, but gets stuck babysitting her niece and nephew. The bitter crook spends her time devising ways to get even with her partner in crime - until the Christmas spirit begins to transform her. Comedy, starring Shannen Doherty and Stefanie von Pfetten(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Star
programme.desc: A con man dresses up as Santa Claus to break out of jail and recover his hidden stash of stolen loot. However, his perfect little plan is thrown into chaos after he's mistaken for the genuine article by two inquisitive kids - who end up making life very difficult indeed. Disney fantasy comedy, starring Ed Asner, Fred Gwynne, Rene Auberjonois and Susan Tyrrell(n)

programme.title: Stealing Christmas
programme.desc: A fugitive lies low in a small town, where he starts to plan his next job on the local bank. However, as he gets involved in the everyday life of the community - even playing Santa for the children - he is dogged by doubts and second thoughts as he reflects on how warmly the residents have welcomed him. Crime comedy, starring Tony Danza, Lea Thompson and Betty White(n)

programme.title: 29th Street
programme.desc: Endearing and entertaining fact-based comedy drama, starring Anthony LaPaglia as an Italian-American whose unbelievable run of good luck proves a real irritation to both himself and his increasingly grouchy father (Danny Aiello). With Lainie Kazan and Frank Pesce, the real-life inspiration for the film(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandpa offers a few words of wisdom to Jason, who has just discovered a close friend has been diagnosed as suffering from a terminal illness. Ron Howard guest stars(n)

programme.desc: Olivia surprises her family by announcing she is going to earn extra money as a door-to-door saleswoman(n)

Michael Landon and Karen Grassle star(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: During a stormy night, Laura and Mary are taken hostage by escaped convicts and held in the school. When one of their number falls ill, they demand Laura fetch a doctor - but she returns with her father(n)

programme.title: Holiday Engagement
programme.desc: A woman who has lived her life under constant pressure from her mother to find a man gets engaged, only for her fiance to leave her just before she is due to head home for Thanksgiving. Rather than face parental disapproval, she hires an actor to pose as her future husband. Comedy, with Bonnie Somerville, Shelley Long and Haylie Duff(n)

programme.title: Christmas in Connecticut
programme.desc: The presenter of a TV show about cookery, marriage and home-making is secretly a childless widow who lives alone and does not know one end of a saucepan from the other. Unfortunately, her ratings-hungry producer decides to film in her home on Christmas Day, and sets about finding her a fictional family to fool the viewers. Comedy directed by Arnold Schwarzenegger, starring Dyan Cannon, Kris Kristofferson and Tony Curtis(n)

programme.title: A Recipe for a Perfect Christmas
programme.desc: A would-be restaurant critic must complete her first article by Christmas Eve to guarantee her future career, but a visit from her overbearing mother leaves her with little time to work. The writer persuades a restaurateur to date her mother in return for a glowing review, only to see the fake romance unexpectedly turn into a real one. Comedy, starring Christine Baranski, Carly Pope and Bobby Cannavale(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Box
programme.desc: A hard-working man's obsession with his business causes him to neglect his family - but a series of strange dreams makes him realise it is the most important thing in his life. Drama, starring Richard Thomas and Maureen O'Hara(n)

programme.title: Unlikely Angel
programme.desc: An egotistical singer dies and goes to Heaven, but is refused entry unless she can prove herself to be less self-centred. Returning to Earth, she finds a job as nanny to a bereaved family - but all her good turns seem to backfire. Fantasy, starring Dolly Parton, Brian Kerwin, Roddy McDowall and Maria Del Mar(n)

programme.title: Under the Mistletoe
programme.desc: Susan Chandler is devastated to lose her husband in a car accident, but she soon realises his spirit is lingering in their home. Meanwhile, her son's matchmaking attempts lead Susan into a relationship with a counsellor, but signs suggest her deceased spouse does not approve. Romantic fantasy, starring Jaime Ray Newman, Michael Shanks and Conan Graham(n)

programme.title: Ebbie
programme.desc: A high-flying but mean-hearted female department store executive is brought back down to earth with a bump by three spooks determined to put a smile on her face in preparation for the Christmas season's celebrations. Festive drama based on the Dickens' tale, starring Susan Lucci, Wendy Crewson, Ron Lea, Jeffrey DeMunn and Molly Parker(n)

programme.title: Beverly Hills Christmas
programme.desc: A spoiled, rich teenager is given a lesson in the true meaning of Christmas when she is visited by a guardian angel, who tries to teach her that true value is found in assisting others, and not in material things. Festive drama, starring Donna Spangler, Dean Cain and Simona Fusco(n)

programme.title: Our First Christmas
programme.desc: A newlywed couple with children from previous marriages long to spend their first Christmas together as one big, happy family. However, the two different sets of siblings are set in their ways and refuse to surrender their customary yuletide traditions. Drama, starring Julie Warner, Steven Eckholdt, Katerina Graham, Dixie Carter and Carly Bondar(n)

programme.title: November Christmas
programme.desc: A father whose daughter is seriously ill fears she will not live through the year. He is determined to make sure her remaining time is happy, and with the help of his neighbours, he arranges to celebrate Halloween and Christmas months ahead of schedule so she can enjoy both holidays. Drama, starring John Corbett and Sam Elliott(n)

programme.title: A Carol Christmas
programme.desc: A self-interested TV talk-show host with heaps of money and a bad attitude vows to pull out all the stops to ensure she avoids any hint of seasonal goodwill, a plan that falls to pieces when three ghosts pay her an unscheduled visit to teach her a lesson. Festive comedy drama based on Dickens' classic story A Christmas Carol, with Tori Spelling, Dinah Manoff, Michael Landes, Jason Brooks and William Shatner

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A jealous John-Boy runs into possible competition for the attention of his favourite schoolteacher

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Mary Ellen falls for a college student, while Grandma starts to feel the effects of old age as she reaches her 68th birthday

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The Ingalls family rallies round and tries to lift Grandfather Holbrook's spirits after the death of his wife by suggesting he write a book. Drama, starring Michael Landon and Barry Sullivan

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Telephones are installed in Walnut Grove, giving Mrs Oleson the opportunity to do a spot of eavesdropping - but unfortunately she overhears a secret which could destroy Jonathan and Alice Garvey's marriage

programme.title: The Christmas Box
programme.desc: A hard-working man's obsession with his business causes him to neglect his family - but a series of strange dreams makes him realise it is the most important thing in his life. Drama, starring Richard Thomas and Maureen O'Hara

programme.title: A Christmas Carol: The Musical
programme.desc: A mean-spirited miser is determined to ensure no one enjoys the festive season - until a Christmas Eve visit by a series of ghosts reveals his past, present and the future, with the intention of showing him the error of his cruel ways. Musical based on the Dickens story, starring Kelsey Grammer, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Jason Alexander, Jane Krakowski and Jesse L Martin

Festive comedy drama based on Dickens' classic story A Christmas Carol, with Tori Spelling, Dinah Manoff, Michael Landes, Jason Brooks and William Shatner

programme.title: A Dad for Christmas

programme.title: Prancer Returns
programme.desc: A youngster moves to a new area, but has trouble settling in, especially when the local bullies set their sights on him. programme.title: Lincoln
programme.desc: From legendary filmmaker Steven Spielberg comes an epic film that chronicles the untold story of the final four months of the man regarded as America's greatest President. Oscar®-winner Daniel Day-Lewis stars as the commander-in-chief of a country in chaos: a man with moral courage and a progressive thinker who challenged the status quo. Featuring an all-star cast including Sally Field, Tommy Lee Jones and James Spader

programme.title: Make-Believe
programme.desc: Floyd buries his pride and accepts a role in Kali's newest music video, directed by Teddy, to spend more time with the singer. Malcolm leverages his job as an agent to bag an ambitious backup dancer with big screen dreams. Meanwhile, Teddy and Floyd have a falling out as Balls battles the blues

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Brief Nudity

programme.title: The Autopsy of Jane Doe
programme.desc: Coroner Tommy Tilden and son Austin run a morgue and crematorium in Virginia. When the local sheriff brings in a body found in the basement of a home, it seems like just another open-and-shut case. As the autopsy proceeds however, they are left reeling as the inspection brings new revelations. Perfectly preserved on the outside, Jane Doe seems to have been the victim of a horrific ritualistic torture. Tommy and Austin begin to piece together these gruesome discoveries, as an unnatural force takes hold of the crematorium

programme.title: Deep-Dish Pizza & a Shot of Holy Water
programme.desc: Bridge, Eliza and Nelson participate in an extreme mud run. Rafi and Tutu baptize Larry without Bridge's consent(c)

Joel and Tess decide to keep a closer eye on Charlie after news of his disappearance and cancer diagnosis leaks online. So as not to arouse suspicion Joel decides he should visit Charlie's wife, Kira - but is that such a good idea?(c)

programme.title: Cell
programme.desc: At the Boston airport, Clay (John Cusack) witnesses a scene of chaotic mayhem when an electronic signal turns hundreds of cell phone users into rabid killers. Desperate to find his estranged wife and son, Clay teams with a train driver (Samuel L. Jackson) to battle the horde of murderous phoners as the city descends into madness

programme.title: 2017 Week 12
programme.desc: Emmy® Award winning INSIDE THE NFL brings you every team, every game, every week of the football season. Join host James Brown for exclusive game highlights from NFL Films plus, expert analysis, in-depth features and hard-hitting commentary from NFL MVPs Phil Simms, Boomer Esiason, veteran linebacker Ray Lewis and special correspondent Brandon Marshall(c)

programme.title: Season With Navy Football, A: Episode 11
programme.desc: This week on A SEASON WITH NAVY FOOTBALL, go behind-the-scenes with exclusive on and off the field access to Coach Niumatalolo and USNA's Midshipmen as they face off at U of H against the Cougars(c)

programme.title: Seraphim Falls
programme.desc: The civil war has ended but Colonel Carver (Liam Neeson) has one final mission: to kill Gideon (Pierce Brosnan) no matter what. Launched by a gunshot, the relentless pursuit takes them far from the comforts and codes of civilization

programme.title: Samuel Beckett: Waiting for Andre
programme.desc: The story of driver Samuel Beckett's school runs with 12-year-old Andre Roussimoff, who is too big for the school bus and later becomes legendary wrestler Andre the Giant. Over the course of a year their friendship evolves

programme.title: Muhammad Ali: The Greatest. Of All Time.
programme.desc: In the early 1980s, after his recent and high profile defeat to Larry Holmes, boxing legend Muhammad Ali takes it upon himself to talk a suicidal stranger down from a ledge. Using his unique brand of wit and wisdom, he succeeds in persuading the man that life is worth living, and learns a huge amount about himself in the process. Starring Noel Clarke as Muhammad Ali, Osy Ikhile as Joe, Lucian Msamati as Herbert Muhammad and Danny John-Jules as Don King

programme.title: Can't Hardly Wait
programme.desc: The graduation ceremony is over at Huntington Hills High, and it's time for the real festivities to begin at the graduation party. Aspiring writer Preston Meyers (Ethan Embry) has been carrying a torch for class knockout Amanda Beckett (Jennifer Love Hewitt) for years. His tormented infatuation culminates at the party, where he seizes the opportunity to declare his love for her after she is dumped by her jock boyfriend (Peter Facinelli). Relationships and friendships are broken and formed

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Jason Bateman and Rebecca Hall as a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until they have a chance encounter with an acquaintance who sends their world into a harrowing tailspin. Co-stars Joel Edgerton

programme.title: Tim & Faith: Soul2Soul
programme.desc: Includes live performances from Tim McGraw and Faith Hill's 2017 Soul2Soul world tour, as well as an intimate look inside their relationship. Never before seen interviews are presented along side behind-the-scenes footage, capturing their chemistry on and off the stage. Directed and executive produced by the award-winning team of Dan Cutforth and Jane Lipsitz

programme.title: George Michael: Freedom
programme.desc: Documentary covering the span of his career, but concentrating on the formative period in the late Grammy Award winner's life, leading up to and following the making of his acclaimed album 'Listen Without Prejudice Vol. 1' and the subsequent High Court battle with his record label that followed, while also becoming poignantly personal about the death of his late partner and first love, Anselmo Feleppa. Filmed before Michael's untimely passing, the film is narrated by him, who was heavily involved in the making of it

programme.title: Out of Sight
programme.desc: When career criminal Jack Foley (Academy Award winner George Clooney) escapes from prison with his partner (Ving Rhames), the two find the US marshals hot on their trail. He doesn't expect to fall in love with one of them, and Karen Sisco (Jennifer Lopez), is similarly thrown to find herself developing feelings back. Even with their distinct views of the law, the unlikely couple make a connection. Samuel L. Jackson, Don Cheadle and Michael Keaton also star. Academy Award winning director Steven Soderbergh directs

programme.title: Don't Knock Twice
programme.desc: A successful sculptor named Jess returns to the UK to rebuild her relationship with Chloe, the daughter she was forced to give up nine years ago. When she agrees to come and live with her, Jess learns that Chloe has not come to stay because she wants to get to know her mother again. She has come because she is scared that a supernatural curse has claimed the life of her boyfriend, Danny, and is now coming for her. Chloe and Danny made the mistake of visiting an abandoned house once home to a witch, that comes for you if you knock on the door

programme.desc: On July 4, 2008, Los Angeles stands on the brink of social, economic and environmental disaster. Boxer Santaros is an action star stricken with amnesia. His life intertwines with Krysta Now, an adult film star developing her own reality television project, and David Clark, a Hermosa Beach police officer who holds the key to a vast conspiracy(n)

programme.title: Lords of Dogtown
programme.desc: Aspiring young surfers realize their real talents lie on a smaller board, and reinvent the art of skateboarding. By incorporating jumps and spins into a previously unchallenging arena, the Z-Boyz quickly turn their passion into a worldwide sporting phenomenon. The young boys become tempted by fame and fortune and their bond as brothers is put to test. International stardom beckons, threatening the relationships they forged with each other and with their surrogate big brother Skip (Heath Ledger)(n)

programme.title: Fair Game (2010)
programme.desc: The real-life scandal involving the public exposure of Valerie Plame as an undercover CIA agent by vindictive White House officials determined to punish her husband Joe Wilson for his political views is recounted in this drama starring Naomi Watts, Sean Penn and Sam Shepard(n)

programme.title: Carol
programme.desc: In 1950s New York, a young woman meets an alluring older woman, trapped in a convenient marriage, and when they take a road trip across the country, they find themselves in the throes of a forbidden love that falls outside of the conventions and laws of the time. Stars Cate Blanchett and Rooney Mara(n)

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Julia Roberts and Nicole Kidman star as a tight-knit team of rising investigators torn apart by a brutal murder. Now, thirteen years later, a chance to permanently resolve the case reveals an unspeakable secret(n)

programme.title: End of Days
programme.desc: It's three days to the millennium and Satan (Gabriel Byrne) has come to New York looking for a bride. Arnold Schwarzenegger plays a down on his luck alcoholic cop who must protect the woman (Robin Tunney) that Satan picks(n)

programme.title: The Hateful Eight
programme.desc: Eight strangers seek refuge from a blizzard in this Western mystery from writer and director Quentin Tarantino. Features an all-star cast, including Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell and Jennifer Jason Leigh(n)

programme.title: Orny Adams: More Than Loud
programme.desc: In his new stand-up special, Orny Adams fluctuates between the relevant and the absurd, attacking what's wrong with the world and at times including what's wrong with him(n)

programme.title: Make-Believe
programme.desc: Floyd buries his pride and accepts a role in Kali's newest music video, directed by Teddy, to spend more time with the singer. Malcolm leverages his job as an agent to bag an ambitious backup dancer with big screen dreams. Meanwhile, Teddy and Floyd have a falling out as Balls battles the blues(n)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Deep-Dish Pizza & a Shot of Holy Water
programme.desc: Bridge, Eliza and Nelson participate in an extreme mud run. Rafi and Tutu baptize Larry without Bridge's consent(n)

programme.title: F**k Paying It Forward
programme.desc: A blast from the past shakes up Fiona's view of her life. Meanwhile, Frank gets involved with Liam's school and becomes the most popular dad in the PTA; Lip learns getting laid is harder than anticipated when sober; Ian crosses a boundary with a kid from the youth center; and Kev and V take a trip to meet his birth family(n)

programme.title: Season With Navy Football, A: Episode 11
programme.desc: This week on A SEASON WITH NAVY FOOTBALL, go behind-the-scenes with exclusive on and off the field access to Coach Niumatalolo and USNA's Midshipmen as they face off at U of H against the Cougars(n)

programme.title: 2017 Week 12
programme.desc: Emmy® Award winning INSIDE THE NFL brings you every team, every game, every week of the football season. Join host James Brown for exclusive game highlights from NFL Films plus, expert analysis, in-depth features and hard-hitting commentary from NFL MVPs Phil Simms, Boomer Esiason, veteran linebacker Ray Lewis and special correspondent Brandon Marshall(n)

programme.title: Orny Adams: More Than Loud
programme.desc: In his new stand-up special, Orny Adams fluctuates between the relevant and the absurd, attacking what's wrong with the world and at times including what's wrong with him(n)

programme.title: Lavell Crawford: Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: Lavell is back home in St. Louis in his new comedy special. He discusses every holiday from what Christmas was like when he was a kid, to the guilt everyone feels on Mother's Day, to Thanksgiving and his family trips to Disneyland(n)

programme.title: Fair Game (2010)
programme.desc: The real-life scandal involving the public exposure of Valerie Plame as an undercover CIA agent by vindictive White House officials determined to punish her husband Joe Wilson for his political views is recounted in this drama starring Naomi Watts, Sean Penn and Sam Shepard(n)
