programme.desc: After the death of his father, a young man whose life is falling apart, returns to his hometown to take care of his mentally ill sister, and tries to save her, while also saving himself(n)

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong(n)

programme.title: The Bear
programme.desc: This unique tale with minimal dialogue and sweeping cinematography is set in 19-century British Columbia and follows a live cub and adult grizzly bear as they join forces to survive the perils of their mountain habitat(n)

programme.title: The Art of the Steal
programme.desc: This eye-opening documentary tells the story of the Barnes Collection, $25 billion worth of masterpieces by Cezanne, Matisse and Renoir that has become the focus of a culture war between those who wish to preserve the intentions of the collection's original owner, and a conspiracy of politically powerful corporations seeking to profit by seizing and relocating the artwork(n)

programme.title: Dean Smith
programme.desc: Coach, mentor, social activist ...the life and legacy of Dean Smith, North Carolina's legendary basketball coach - who went to 11 Finals Fours and won two National Championships, with players like Michael Jordan, James Worthy, Vince Carter and Jerry Stackhouse - is remembered and celebrated by former players and colleagues(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: Dev Patel stars in this story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, who leaves his home country and his young bride to travel to Trinity College in England in 1931 and despite his brilliance and the help of an eccentric mentor, must fight to prove himself and his theories to the establishment. Co-stars Jeremy Irons(n)

programme.title: Jurassic School
programme.desc: Nerdy middle schooler Tommy is forced take care of a baby dinosaur after his cloned science fair project hatches early. He quickly begins to think of the creature not only as a pet, but also as a friend. But when the dinosaur escapes on the day of the fair, Tommy must figure out a way to get the creature back before greedy grown-ups get to him first(n)

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Based on an inspiring true story, Academy Award® winner Cuba Gooding Jr. stars as a man released from prison after 18 years, who starts a chess club to keep inner-city youth from the streets and give them what he never had: a future(n)

programme.title: The Dog Lover
programme.desc: Sara Gold is a young girl on a quest to save man's best friend. When she goes undercover to take down a dog breeder suspected of wrongdoing, she quickly finds out she might be on the wrong side of right. Sara must make a decision: to continue and follow the orders of her organization, United Animal Protection Agency, or trust her instincts and the boy she's fallen in love with(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: Dev Patel stars in this story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, who leaves his home country and his young bride to travel to Trinity College in England in 1931 and despite his brilliance and the help of an eccentric mentor, must fight to prove himself and his theories to the establishment. Co-stars Jeremy Irons(n)

programme.title: Whitney. "Can I Be Me"
programme.desc: Directors Nick Broomfield and Rudi Dolezal weave never before seen video, candid interviews and behind the scenes performance footage into a raw and uncensored portrait of Whitney Houston, who died suddenly at age 48 after years of struggling with addiction. Exploring her far-reaching impact, the directors focus on Houston's central dilemma: even though she had made millions of dollars and was recognized as having one of the greatest voices of all time, she still couldn't do what she wanted, either professionally or in her personal life

programme.title: Jenny's Wedding
programme.desc: Jenny Farrell has led an openly gay life with everyone except her family. She has kept it a secret out of compassion for her parents, knowing they are happiest living in a small, safe and familiar world. Realizing she is missing out on having a full life, Jenny decides to marry Kitty, a woman they thought was her roommate. Her parents are shocked to find out how little they know their daughter and fear becoming the object of gossip in their small community. Misunderstanding leads to misunderstanding, and long-standing grudges are revealed

programme.title: The Preppie Connection
programme.desc: Thomas Mann stars as a working class prodigy who enters the elite corridors of a prep school in his home town and vies for acceptance into the world of privilege, while trying to charm the beautiful and elusive girl of his dreams, but finds that the way in with the preppy crowd comes at a steep cost

programme.title: Boogie Woogie
programme.desc: The over-hyped, pretentious modern art scene in London is satirized in this dark ensemble comedy about the double dealings and calculated relationships encircling the effort to get an aging collector to part with a valuable painting. Gillian Anderson, Alan Cumming and Heather Graham star

programme.title: Fair Game (2010)
programme.desc: The real-life scandal involving the public exposure of Valerie Plame as an undercover CIA agent by vindictive White House officials determined to punish her husband Joe Wilson for his political views is recounted in this drama starring Naomi Watts, Sean Penn and Sam Shepard

programme.title: Rabid
programme.desc: After a young woman has a motorcycle accident that leads to experimental surgery to save her life, she develops a taste for blood that spurs a city-wide zombie epidemic

programme.title: Becoming Cary Grant
programme.desc: Using words from his unpublished autobiography along with newly-discovered personal footage shot with a film-maker's eye, Cary Grant - one of Hollywood's greatest stars - tells his story himself. Exploring his long journey from childhood poverty to global fame, this radically new perspective of a man on a quest to find the love that eluded him most of his life reveals the man behind the mask of subtle charm and suave sophistication

programme.title: The Art of the Steal
programme.desc: This eye-opening documentary tells the story of the Barnes Collection, $25 billion worth of masterpieces by Cezanne, Matisse and Renoir that has become the focus of a culture war between those who wish to preserve the intentions of the collection's original owner, and a conspiracy of politically powerful corporations seeking to profit by seizing and relocating the artwork

programme.title: Claire in Motion
programme.desc: Three weeks after Claire's husband mysteriously disappears, the police end their investigation. Claire doesn't give up, and soon discovers his troubling secrets, including a graduate student with whom he had formed a close bond. As she digs deeper, Claire begins to lose her grip on how well she truly knew her husband and questions her own identity in the process

programme.title: The Parent Trap
programme.desc: Hallie Parker, a hip Californian, and Annie James, a proper London miss (both played by Lindsay Lohan) are identical twins who don't even know each other exist - until they accidentally meet at summer camp. Now they're up to their freckles in schemes and dreams to switch places, get their parents (Dennis Quaid and Natasha Richardson) back together, and have the family they've always wished for

programme.title: Lucky Them
programme.desc: Toni Collette stars as veteran rock journalist who has one last chance to prove her value to her magazine's editor by going on a no-stone unturned search to discover what really happened to a long lost rock god, who also happens to be her ex-boyfriend. She teams up with an eccentric amateur documentary filmmaker and they hit the road to lay old ghosts to rest and find some answers. Also stars Oliver Platt

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: Nadine (Hailee Steinfeld) and Krista (Haley Lu Richardson) are inseparable best friends attempting to navigate high school together, until Nadine's older brother Darian (Blake Jenner) and Krista begin dating. With her view of the world rocked, Nadine is forced to see the people in her life, including her well-meaning but distracted mother (Kyra Sedgwick), and unlikely mentor and History teacher Mr. Bruner (Woody Harrelson), with fresh eyes and new appreciation. She realizes that people - and life - are more complicated than she thought

programme.title: The Parent Trap
programme.desc: Hallie Parker, a hip Californian, and Annie James, a proper London miss (both played by Lindsay Lohan) are identical twins who don't even know each other exist - until they accidentally meet at summer camp. Now they're up to their freckles in schemes and dreams to switch places, get their parents (Dennis Quaid and Natasha Richardson) back together, and have the family they've always wished for

programme.title: Burnt
programme.desc: Bradley Cooper stars as a former top chef whose drug and alcohol habit led to a career meltdown but he gets a shot at redemption when his former maître d' hires him as the head of his fine-dining restaurant in London. Stars Sienna Miller and Daniel Brühl(n)

programme.title: The Free World
programme.desc: After spending two decades in prison for a crime he didn't commit, Mo (Boyd Holbrook) struggles to put his past behind him and readjust to a new life. Doris (Elisabeth Moss) is trapped in another sort of prison: an abusive marriage. When a dramatic encounter brings them together, Mo soon finds himself risking everything—including being locked up once again for someone else's crime—to protect the fragile Doris. Academy Award® winner Octavia Spencer and Sung Kang costar(n)

programme.title: It Runs in the Family (2003)
programme.desc: Michael Douglas and his legendary actor father Kirk Douglas team up on-screen for the first time with this comedy about a successful businessman whose midlife crisis inspires him to reach out to several generations of his family, with decidedly comic results. Bernadette Peters costars(n)

programme.title: The Claim
programme.desc: Thomas Hardy's "The Mayor of Casterbridge" gets a frontier makeover with this acclaimed Western about a wealthy Irish immigrant named Dillon (Peter Mullan) whose good fortune in the bucolic California town of Kingdom Come stems from a Faustian bargain he made years ago, a deal that returns to haunt him with the arrival of a railroad surveyor (Wes Bentley) and two mysterious women (Nastassja Kinski and Sarah Polley). Milla Jovovich ("Resident Evil") costars in this film from director Michael Winterbottom ("Welcome to Sarajevo")(n)

programme.title: Tenderness
programme.desc: A confused fifteen-year-old dreamer in search of an escape from her troubled home life becomes enthralled with a young man with a violent past and embarks on a dangerous road trip. Stars Russell Crowe and Sophie Traub(n)

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents(n)

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments(n)

programme.title: The Wicked Within
programme.desc: After the death of a child, a vengeful spirit takes possession of a woman, who forces each family member to confess to their buried lies or face the morbid consequences of their sins(n)

programme.title: The Boy
programme.desc: A young woman (Lauren Cohan) takes a job as a nanny in a remote English village and soon discovers the family child is a life-sized doll - cared for like a real child as a way to cope with the death of their son 20 years prior(n)

programme.title: Burke & Hare
programme.desc: A pair of financially strapped, 19th century Irishmen (Simon Pegg and Andy Serkis) discover a lucrative if gruesome source of income when they begin providing corpses for medical experiments to a well-regarded Edinburgh doctor. Their newly filled coffers and the expensive attentions of their romantic interests, however, soon pressure them to continue and even enhance the cadaver procurement process. Isla Fisher costars in this dark period comedy(n)

programme.title: Sex, Lies, and Videotape
programme.desc: James Spader stars as Graham Dalton, a drifter whose presence in a Louisiana home has a lasting effect on his old college friend John (Peter Gallagher), a lecherous yuppie having an affair with his wife's sister (Laura San Giacomo). Graham soon develops a friendship with John's repressed wife Ann (Andie MacDowell), who in turn discovers a secret about her houseguest that will change her life. The award-winning debut of first-time writer/director Steven Soderbergh ("Erin Brockovich," "Traffic")(n)

programme.title: While You Were Sleeping
programme.desc: A lonely Chicago token collector (Sandra Bullock) pines for a handsome commuter (Peter Gallagher). When she saves his life after a mugging that leaves him comatose, she's mistaken for his fiancee. Playing along, she instead falls in love with her "fiancee's" brother (Bill Pullman), thus setting in motion a decidedly bizarre love triangle. Jack Warden, Peter Boyle, Glynis Johns, Michael Rispoli, Ally Walker and Monica Keena costar in this romantic comedy that made Bullock a star(n)

Their secret liaison plays out while Hughes' aviation innovations keep pace with his debilitating eccentricities. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Collateral Beauty

programme.title: Term Life

programme.title: Criminal Activities

programme.title: Enough

Peter Webber's directorial debut. Based on the novel by Tracy Chevalier. (repeat) (cc)(n)

programme.title: Gods of Egypt
programme.desc: A young thief named Bek enlists the help of the powerful Egyptian god Horus to overthrow the vicious deity Set, who has seized control of the land. Bek's true love has been captured, forcing the mortal rebel to fight back in order to free her and the people of Egypt from Set's tyrannical rule. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: An ancient assassin attempts to trounce an evil conqueror by teaming up with a coalition of the remaining "free tribes" surviving under tyrannical rule. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Three Kings
programme.desc: An audacious blend of political satire, drama and action focuses on four GIs in Iraq at the end of the Gulf War who try to steal a cache of gold. George Clooney, Mark Wahlberg, Ice Cube, and Spike Jonze star. David O. Russell directed and wrote the script.. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Get Smart
programme.desc: This adaptation of the classic TV spy spoof revives inept agent Maxwell Smart of the top-secret agency CONTROL, and unleashes him on the modern world. His partner is beautiful, deadly Agent 99, who would rather battle the forces of KAOS alone than with the inexperienced Max at her side. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: NYC cop John McClane fights terrorists in an L.A. high-rise in a bid to rescue his estranged wife, who happens to be one of the hostages. Meanwhile, the terrorists attempt to steal $600 million from a high-tech safe. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Die Hard 2
programme.desc: A New York cop tries to deprive terrorists of their quarry at a Washington, D.C., airport. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Die Hard With a Vengeance
programme.desc: Cop John McClane teams with a shop owner to outwit a terrorist who is making him perform a series of dangerous tasks all around Manhattan. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Strange Days
programme.desc: On the eve of the millennium, a former cop hustles virtual-reality discs that can record any human experience---including murder. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Kicks
programme.desc: A black 15-year-old finally gets his hands on a coveted pair of Air Jordan sneakers, only to see them stolen by a local thug. With the help of two of his friends, he decides to embark on an adventure through inner-city Oakland to retrieve them. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: After losing his driver's license, a bumbling cop teams up with a brassy cabbie so he can pursue a team of female bank robbers who are led by a beautiful Brazilian. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: A biography of Howard Hughes, centering on his glory years from the 1920s to the 1940s. After making a fortune improving the design of oil drilling bits, Hughes becomes the Hollywood mogul behind RKO studios, and devotes his life to aviation. The film also depicts Hughes' romances Hollywood starlets Jean Harlow and Katharine Hepburn. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: In a post-apocalyptic future, the world has been besieged by intelligent, fire-breathing dragons. A survivalist and a military man clash as they lead one of the last few vestiges of humanity in an all-out war against the vicious prehistoric beasts. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Huntsman Winter's War
programme.desc: This spin-off of "Snow White and the Huntsman" acts as both prequel and sequel to the original film, detailing the adventures of Eric the Huntsman as he gets caught up in the rivalry between wicked queens Ravenna and Freya. During his quest, Eric is also endangered by his feelings for fellow warrior Sara, since ice queen Freya has decreed that love is forbidden in her kingdom. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Yes Man
programme.desc: A perennial naysayer becomes a guy who just can't say "no" (and won't) after attending a self-help seminar that challenges him to say yes to everything for a year. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Twenty-two-year-old slacker Scott Pilgrim meets Ramona Flowers, the girl of his dreams, and learns that in order to win her heart he'll have to defeat her seven evil exes in a series of video-game-styled battles. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Be Cool
programme.desc: Mobster Chili Palmer ditches the movie biz for the music industry when he decides to manage a singer in this sequel. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Next Friday
programme.desc: Sequel to 1995's “Friday” sends slacker Craig Jones (Ice Cube) on the lam to his lottery-winning uncle's house in the suburbs to hide from an escaped con (Tom 'Tiny' Lister Jr.). Day-Day: Mike Epps. Mr. Jones: John Witherspoon. Uncle Elroy: Don 'D.C.' Curry. Roach: Justin Pierce. Karla: Lisa Rodriguez. (cc)

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: A hugely successful businesswoman is convicted of insider trading and sentenced to prison. After being released, she tries to earn redemption and revamp her public image by helping a group of young girls in their quest to sell brownies. (cc)

programme.title: Fletch
programme.desc: Investigative reporter Fletch assumes a variety of identities while pursuing a scoop, and is later approached by a rich aviation executive who claims to be dying and wants Fletch to kill him so his wife can collect the insurance. (cc)

programme.title: Live by Night
programme.desc: Joe Coughlin, the son of a Boston police lieutenant, moves to Florida during the Prohibition era to become a bootlegger. As his operation grows, Coughlin faces off against local gangsters, Klansmen and religious evangelicals while he fights for control of Tampa's criminal underworld. (cc)

programme.title: Any Given Sunday
programme.desc: After the aging starter gets hurt, an old-school, head football coach clashes with the team's new, younger owner and backup quarterback. (cc)

programme.title: Anything Else
programme.desc: Woody Allen wrote and directed this mediocre “Annie Hall” wannabe about a writer (Jason Biggs) frustrated by his neurotic girlfriend (Christina Ricci). Allen also costars as the writer's mentor. Cinematographer Darius Khondji make glorious use of New York City locales. (cc)

programme.title: She's Out of My League
programme.desc: A kindhearted but socially awkward airport security agent wins the affections of a gorgeous party planner and vows to make the relationship work, despite the misgivings of his friends and family. (cc)

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous The Movie
programme.desc: In this big-screen continuation of the popular British sitcom, hard-living ladies Edina and Patsy flee to the French Riviera after they accidentally cause the death of a celebrity at a posh party. (cc)

programme.title: The Cider House Rules
programme.desc: An orphan grows up under the tutelage of a kindly doctor in World War II Maine, where the young man refuses to assist his mentor with the illegal abortions that he performs in hopes of keeping the women from dangerous incompetents. Michael Caine won the Best Supporting Actor Oscar as the doctor. (cc)

programme.title: Hereafter
programme.desc: The lives of a working-class American, a French journalist and a London schoolboy intersect when their collective grief leads them on a journey to discover the truth about the afterlife. (cc)

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: This biopic of celebrated physicist Stephen Hawking explores his early years at Cambridge, where he fell in love with liberal-arts student and future wife Jane shortly before being diagnosed with ALS. As the years progress, Jane begins to feel more like a nurse than a spouse, and Hawking develops feelings for a woman who is hired to care for him. (cc)

programme.title: Crooklyn
programme.desc: Portrait of a close-knit black family living in 1970s Brooklyn, as seen through the eyes of the youngest daughter. This comedy-drama follows them as they deal with money woes, eccentric neighbors and the sons' troublemaking. (cc)

programme.title: Dolores Claiborne
programme.desc: A big-city journalist discovers a terrible secret about her family's past after her estranged mother becomes the prime suspect in the death of the elderly woman for whom she had been caring. Soon the daughter learns the details of her father's mysterious death years before, and eventually she realizes how profoundly she misunderstood her mother. (cc)

programme.title: Unforgiven
programme.desc: In this revisionist Western, a former gunslinger-turned-farmer agrees to help hunt down two cowboys who assaulted and disfigured a prostitute. However, his quest brings him into conflict with an authoritarian sheriff. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Class Action
programme.desc: Father and daughter lawyers (Gene Hackman, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio) become adversaries in a lawsuit against an auto company. Grazier: Colin Friels. Estelle: Joanna Merlin. Holbrook: Larry Fishburne. Quinn: Donald Moffat. Pavel: Jan Rubes. Brian: Jonathan Silverman. Directed by Michael Apted. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Mystic River
programme.desc: Childhood friends Jimmy, Sean and Dave are reunited by a tragedy involving one of their children. As homicide detective Sean investigates, Jimmy enlists his relatives to launch their own inquiry. Later, suspicions fall on Jimmy and Sean's old friend Dave, who harbors some disturbing secrets. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Charlie's Angels Full Throttle
programme.desc: The trio must locate stolen rings that contain encrypted information about the Witness Protection Program. They also take on a fallen Angel who has gone over to the dark side. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Take
programme.desc: A maverick CIA agent forges an unlikely bond with a pickpocket after the latter is framed for a bombing in Paris. Soon, they combine their brawn and street smarts to investigate a terrorist conspiracy targeting the city's Bastille Day celebrations. (cc)(n)

programme.title: 5 Star Max Programming
programme.desc: (cc)(n)

programme.title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
programme.desc: A study of adolescent obsession with sex, drugs, and rock and roll has a girl seeking romance advice from an upperclassman on how to get a boy to notice her; and a stoner feuding with a teacher. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Hail, Caesar!
programme.desc: Slick Hollywood fixer Eddie Mannix is pressed into action when a superstar actor is kidnapped and held for ransom by a mysterious group. Mannix races to quietly collect the ransom money before the gossip mags catch wind of the scandal. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Mr. Mom
programme.desc: A laid-off auto engineer runs the household while his wife takes the role of breadwinner, and he ends up playing poker with the neighborhood housewives and considering infidelity with a dedicated homewrecker. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Winter's Tale
programme.desc: A thief falls for a wealthy woman who's dying of tuberculosis in 1916 New York. Later, he winds up in the modern day and works with a single mother to find a way to reunite with his true love. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Shine
programme.desc: Geoffrey Rush won an Oscar for his portrayal of piano prodigy David Helfgott, whose domineering father (Armin Mueller-Stahl) caused him to have a mental breakdown. David (teen): Noah Taylor. Gillian: Lynn Redgrave. Prof. Parkes: John Gielgud. Directed by Scott Hicks. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Company
programme.desc: Robert Altman's ensemble drama about a dancer (Neve Campbell) trying to make her way to the top of a Chicago ballet troupe. Engrossing story, dazzling choreography. Malcolm McDowell. Campbell, who was once a dancer, approached Altman with the story idea. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Step Up
programme.desc: In this teen tale full of dancing and romancing, a Baltimore tough guy teams with a haughty ballerina for a dance competition at her prestigious private school. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Practical Magic
programme.desc: Two witches become the target of a detective's investigation after one of their boyfriends goes missing. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Good Will Hunting
programme.desc: An Oscar-winning screenplay by costars Matt Damon and Ben Affleck propels this tale about a brilliant but undisciplined janitor who confronts his problems with the help of a therapist (Robin Williams, who also won an Oscar). (cc)(n)

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: A widow receives posthumous letters from her late husband that encourage her to carry on with her life. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Bridget Jones The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: Sequel in which Bridget worries about her relationship with Darcy and is upset when work reunites her with the womanizing Daniel. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Beguiled

programme.title: Simon Birch

programme.title: The Color of Money
programme.desc: A pool hustler mentors a talented young player and his street-smart girlfriend, but his attempts to corrupt the young man make him reassess his own decisions in life. (cc)(n)

programme.title: A Sound of Thunder

programme.title: Dead Calm

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości

programme.title: Impreska

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości(n)

BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura(n)

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura(n)

programme.title: All Over the Place: Asia
programme.desc: Ed Petrie and his CBBC mates go on an adventure to find the most unusual and amazing places in Asia. And this time it's all the Main Events in one show! They take part in a belly button festival, a giant sandal race and wooden washtub challenge in Japan; ride in tuk-tuk taxis in Sri Lanka; give it pedalo power and take part in a game of Kabaddi in India; test their Kung Fu talents in China; and show off their blowpipe skills at a tribal village in Malaysia! Ed is joined on this bonkers road trip by Cel Spellman, Chris Johnson, Naomi Wilkinson, Ben Shires, Michelle Ackerley, Victoria Cook, Johny Pitts and Inel Tomlinson - there's stuff to do in Asia that is totally ace and it turns up All Over The Place

programme.title: Rank the Prank
programme.desc: Rank the Prank - pranking Hollywood style! Today our pesky pranksters are Prank 360 (Zhara and Sara) and Gladiators (Hadrian and Luke) who team up with SFX specialists Marc Reichel and Andy Antoine and stunt performer Devon Slack to stage the biggest and best PUBLIC PRANKS on an unsuspecting public. Today teams invade an office building and for unsuspecting targets, it's going to be anything but another... day at the office! It's all hands on deck to rig the hidden cameras and special effects required to bring our Pranksters' ideas to life. But which team will impress our prank-loving panel of 'Ranksters' to win the chance to stage a mind blowing MEGA PRANK on a 'target' of their choice? It's a battle between the head-scratching 'Office Switcheroo' and the super-charged 'Trainwreck Hallway'! Ranksters ... the choice is yours. For the winning team, Marc, Andy and Devon have planned a MEGA PRANK packed with ninja power! The setting is a martial arts dojo, complete with flying rigs, flying crates and flying people! Will the targets flap their wings and take flight too? One thing's for sure, this MEGA PRANK is gonna be fly!

programme.title: Matilda and the Ramsay Bunch
programme.desc: Matilda and the Ramsay Bunch are back home in London and they're throwing a party for some of their friends. With a party to organise the gang get to work - Matilda's brother Jack and sisters Megan and Holly take shopping to another level as they speed along the river Thames on a high-performance rib to pick up supplies. Matilda's in charge of the party food: build your own spicy sausage pitta bread sandwiches with zingy yoghurt sauce and popcorn cakes. The popcorn cakes idea came from Scarlet, a Matilda and the Ramsay Bunch viewer who emailed it to Matilda's Food Blog. Great food, friends and fun, and the party finishing with a bang when the guys play an explosive game with a watermelon - parties don't get much better!

programme.sub-title: My Story: Childhood During the Highland Clearances.
programme.desc: Grandad James takes Iona on a journey of discovery to find out what life was like for a child from the Highlands more than 200 years ago. Iona and grandad James dress up in clothes from the time known as the Highland Clearances. They learn about a boy called Lachlan and why he, and many other families, had to leave their homes and move to a new country. Together they discover what life was like for Lachlan in Scotland - where he would live, the language he spoke, the food he would have eaten and the jobs he would do to help his family. Iona and grandad James then visit an American township to see how different Lachlan's new life in America would have been and they try their hand at panning for gold
